title: Hiren's BootCD 10.0 and XP on USB?

forumNotes.author: HarelZar
forumNotes.content:
Hi  
i have Hiren's BootCD 10.0 on USB and it works i use this guide: [Hiren's BootCD From USB Flash Drive](http://www.hiren.info/pages/bootcd-on-usb-disk "External link")  

I also made an unattended XP SP3 DVD with drivers and all apps   

i want to combine the two on the same USB  

can you point me to the right direction.  

10x  
Harel
